name: Bunny Boy
description:
This game was made for "Curdle Jam II"! Following the theme "Just out of reach," I made this game about a bunny who tried to run away from a pursuing cat. The catch is, this bunny has to stay close enough that the adversarial kitty gets exercise, and avoid health issues. Good luck staying alive!

I used a bunch of really cool art and music assets, and the sources are listed below.

Cats and Bunny Sprites:

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?members/whtdragon.8636/

Grass Background:

https://opengameart.org/users/txturs

"Baum" Tree:

https://opengameart.org/users/geloescht

Level 3 dense tree patch:

https://opengameart.org/users/andrettin

Soundtrack and GameOver sound effects:

https://spikyandrew.itch.io/playful-8-bit-sounds-and-music

Cat Growl:

InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Menu backgrounds:

https://runica.itch.io/pixel-menu-box-buttons
